title: endhu dhaaginaaDO
sahitya:
endu dAginADO IDaku rA nannEDu daya vaccurA O manasA



anupallavi



enduku capalamu vinavE nA manavini mundaTivale bhaktula

pOSincuTak-



caraNam 1



alanADu kanakakashipu niNDAru calamu jEsi sutuni sakala

bAdhala beTTaga madini

     tALaka nishcaludaina prahlAdu kOraku kambamu lOpala nuNDaga

lEdA yArIti nEd-



caraNam 2



munu vArivAha vAhana tanayudu madamuna ravijuni cAla goTTuTa

jUchi manasu tALajAla

     lEka prEmamuna pAlanamu sEya tALa taruvu maruguna nilvaga

lEdA yArIti nEd-



caraNam 3



toli janmamula nADu jEsina duSkarmamula  nanaganu sEya nAru

satrulanu baTTi pODisEya

     nadiyugAka ilalO cancala virahita nijabhakta janulanu

tyAgarAjuni rakSimpa nE
